overview: iTMRW is a 75-minute dance theater piece set to a live performance of a futuristic concept album by Arc Iris.  The romance of Robert and his android partner, Jenny, unfolds against the backdrop of a world where advanced technology is both a source of and a “cure” for human alienation. Advertisements come in the form of pop-up thoughts, entire cities float on islands of trash, and female forms are purchased and discarded at will. The piece takes its title from iTMRW, the ultra mega-corporation that produces and sells every single thing known to man. Amazon, Google, and Facebook hooked up with the U.S government, made ugly, ugly love, and spawned a demon baby.
title: iTMRW: A Sci-Fi Ballet
